XRProjectionLayer.summary: The XRProjectionLayer interface of the WebXR Device API is a layer that fills the entire view of the observer and is refreshed close to the device's native frame rate.

remarks.para: XRProjectionLayer is supported by all objects (no layers feature descriptor is needed).

To create a new XRProjectionLayer, call .
To present layers to the XR device, add them to the layers render state using .
XRProjectionLayer objects don't have an associated , because they render to the full frame.
